title: Chemical Thermo-Material
description: Principles and applications of thermodynamics to materials science and engineering.  Phase equilibria and the concepts necessary to interpret phase diagrams.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MSE 2001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2602 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
